title: New screen - Tests
description:
factory-tools exposes tooling for running tests and test coverage based on paths.
We need a new screen "Tests" that will be accessible from the Sidebar (under "Agents"). It requires a new icon to be created.
The new screen needs to have 2 sections (selectable via tabs):
1) test results - especially if there are any failures, we want to show the test lines and the code that is responsible for the failure
2) test coverage - show the latest test coverage in a clear format so the user can read and analyse the data well.

While the tests/coverage is running - make sure the user is shown appropriate loaders so the screen doesn't seem stuck.

features.title: Create 'Tests' Screen and Add Sidebar Navigation
features.description: Create a new screen component for 'Tests'. Add a new navigation entry in the sidebar, including a new icon, to route to this screen. The initial screen should have a basic layout with a title.

features.title: Implement Tabbed View for Test Results and Coverage
features.description: On the 'Tests' screen, implement a tabbed interface with two tabs: 'Test Results' and 'Test Coverage'. The content for each tab will be implemented in subsequent features.

features.title: Integrate Test Runner and Display Loading State
features.description: Integrate the `factory-tools` test runner. Add a 'Run Tests' button to the 'Test Results' tab. When clicked, trigger the test run and display a loading indicator while the tests are in progress. The raw results should be stored in the component's state.

features.title: Display Test Results
features.description: Parse the test results from the `factory-tools` runner and display them in the 'Test Results' tab. Special attention should be given to formatting failures, showing the failed test, the error message, and a relevant code snippet.

features.title: Integrate Coverage Runner and Display Loading State
features.description: Add a 'Run Coverage' button to the 'Test Coverage' tab. When clicked, trigger the coverage run via `factory-tools` and display a loading indicator until the process is complete. The raw coverage data should be stored in the component's state.

features.title: Display Coverage Report
features.description: Parse the coverage data from the `factory-tools` runner and display it in a clear, user-friendly format within the 'Test Coverage' tab. The report should be easy to read and analyze.
